Package Model

Class DataBase

java.lang.Object
Model.FileManager
Model.DataBase
public class DataBase extends FileManager
Database acts as a pipeline between the model and the rest of the program. It extends filemanager since some of the FileManager methods needs to be used elsewhere aswell.

    • updateSet

      public void updateSet(String fileName)
      Given a filename update its corresponding set. Removes set from setHashMap if it is not readable.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The given fileName (setType.setName)

    • getSetSize

      public int getSetSize(String setName)
      Gets the set size.
      Parameters:
      setName - The set name. In the format : (setName) without setType and without .txt
      Returns:
      The size of the list of cards inside the Set.

    • getAnswers

      public String[] getAnswers(String setName, int cardIndex)
      Gets the answers of the given set at the given index.
      Parameters:
      setName - The name of the set in format : (setName) without setType and without .txt
      cardIndex - The index of the card in the set.
      Returns:
      Returns a list of answers.

    • getQuestion

      public String getQuestion(String setName, int cardIndex)
      Gets the question of the card at the given card index of set with the given name inside setHashMap.
      Parameters:
      setName - The name of the set. In the format : (SetType.SetName)
      cardIndex - The index of the card inside the set.
      Returns:
      Returns the question in the form of a String.

    • getAnswer

      public String getAnswer(String setName, int cardIndex)
      Gets the answer of the card at the given card index of set with the given name inside setHashMap.
      Parameters:
      setName - The name of the set. In the format : (SetType.SetName)
      cardIndex - The index of the card inside the set.
      Returns:
      Returns the question in the form of a String.

    • deleteSet

      public void deleteSet(String setName) throws IOException
      Deletes the set with the given setName from setHashMap and deletes the corresponding text file from the hard drive.
      Parameters:
      setName - The name of the set that should be deleted. In the format : (SetType.SetName)
      Throws:
      IOException - Forwards exception if deleting the text file results in an error.

    • addCreateSetListItem

      public void addCreateSetListItem(CreateSetListItem c)

      Parameters:
      c - The createSetListItem object that should be added to the list.

    • clearCreateSetListItem

      public void clearCreateSetListItem()
      Clears the createSetListItems list.

    • getCardAtIndex

      public Card getCardAtIndex(String setName, int cardIndex)
      Gets the card with the given index inside the set with the given name inside setHashMap.
      Parameters:
      setName - The name of the set that contains the card. In the format : (setName)
      cardIndex - The index of the card inside the cards list in the given set.
      Returns:
      Returns a card.

    • getSet

      public Set getSet(String setname)
      Gets the set with the given name from the setHashMap.
      Parameters:
      setname - The name of the set. In the format : (setName)
      Returns:
